description: The Department of Taxation and Finance annually establishes a residential assessment ratio for assessing taxing jurisdictions to determine at what level of market value those jurisdictions are assessing their residential property.

metadata.attribution: New York State Department of Taxation and Finance
metadata.description: The Department of Taxation and Finance annually establishes a residential assessment ratio for assessing taxing jurisdictions to determine at what level of market value those jurisdictions are assessing their residential property.

name: Residential Assessment Ratios:  Beginning Rate Year 1982
